groupset.description:
10 healthy adult male volunteers, aged 18.8 to 30.0 years;
Healthy adult male Caucasian volunteers. None of the subjects were taking any prescription or non-presecription medication at time of the study.
Each subject was fasted from the previous evening until at least 2h after the administration of the oral dose.
Subjects were instructed to abstain from caffeine-containing food and beverages, tobacco (9 of the 10 subjects were non-smokers) and alcohol from 72h before, until 24h after caffeine administration.

groups.name: S1
groups.description:
10 healthy adult male volunteers, aged 18.8 to 30.0 years;
Healthy adult male Caucasian volunteers. None of the subjects were taking any prescription or non-presecription medication at time of the study.
Each subject was fasted from the previous evening until at least 2h after the administration of the oral dose.
Subjects were instructed to abstain from caffeine-containing food and beverages, tobacco (9 of the 10 subjects were non-smokers) and alcohol from 72h before, until 24h after caffeine administration.

interventionset.description: administred 5mg/kg dose of caffeine either as an aqueous oral solution or an intravenous infusion, on separate occasions about 1 week apart, in a randomized crossover fashion.||administred 5mg/kg dose of caffeine either as an aqueous oral solution or an intravenous infusion, on separate occasions about 1 week apart, in a randomized crossover fashion.
